name: Grinning Face
description: A face with a big open (grinning) mouth showing teeth, expressing general happiness and positivity.

name: Grinning Face with Smiling Eyes
description: Smiling face with tightly closed eyes, used to show intense happiness or delight.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: Face laughing so hard that tears come out; used for hilarious reactions.

name: Rolling on the Floor Laughing
description: Extreme laughter, used for something very funny.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: Cool, confident, or relaxed mood; often used to show swagger.

name: Winking Face
description: Wink used to convey humor, flirtation, or a light-hearted tone.

name: Thinking Face
description: Indicates thinking, puzzlement, or skepticism.

name: Relieved Face
description: Relief, calm, or contentment; a relaxed smile.

name: Sleeping Face
description: Sleeping, tired, or bored; eyes closed with mouth slightly open.

name: See-No-Evil Monkey
description: Monkey covering its eyes; used to signify 'I didn't see that' or embarrassment.

name: Hear-No-Evil Monkey
description: Monkey covering its ears; used to mean 'I didn't hear that' or playful avoidance.

name: Speak-No-Evil Monkey
description: Monkey covering its mouth; indicates 'I won't say anything' or secrecy.

name: Thumbs Up
description: Approval, agreement, or positive acknowledgment.

name: Red Heart
description: Classic red heart, representing love, affection, or strong positive feelings.

name: Sparkles
description: Sparkles or shiny effect; used to emphasize, celebrate, or show something magical.

name: Fire
description: Flame; used to indicate something is hot, trending, or intense.

name: Pile of Poo
description: Playful depiction of poop; often used jokingly or to indicate something unpleasant.

name: Party Popper
description: Celebration, party, or congratulations; often used for festive occasions.

name: Clapping Hands
description: Applause, congratulations, or appreciation.

name: Folded Hands
description: Prayer, thanks, or request; also commonly used to express gratitude.

name: Victory Hand
description: Victory or peace hand gesture; often used to signify 'V' for victory or peace.

name: OK Hand
description: OK gesture; indicates approval or that everything is fine.

name: Face with Medical Mask
description: Wearing a medical mask; used for illness, health concerns, or protection.

name: Laptop Computer
description: Laptop computer; used to represent computing, work, or coding.

name: Globe Showing Europe-Africa
description: Earth globe showing Europe-Africa; represents global, world, or international contexts.
